Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{3: 'Following the shared coordinates on your terminal, you push through the crowds until you reach the designated location—a food street on the western side of the exhibition.'}
{3: "Just as you begin scanning the crowd of mechanoids for the signal's source, a familiar, swaying silhouette in the corner of your eye catches your attention."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yo, Gray Raven Commandant!', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Yata spots you too. She stops pushing her cart, which is piled high with goods, and waves from across the way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1269.jpg'}
{2: 'What are you doing here?', 3: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Heard there was a chance to set up a booth, so I came to test my recent "training results."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Remember this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pulls out a small, well-worn booklet from her cart—the very same "cookbook" you helped her recover on Hydrangea Island not long ago.'}
{2: 'Right. The taiyaki from Hydrangea Island.', 3: '23', 4: "I didn't realize you were still holding onto this.", 5: '23'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "The last time I set up shop, things went alright, but it still didn't feel quite like Uncle Morita's version.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'So I asked my teammates for cooking tips and came up with an improved recipe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Even Shiva gave me this wide-eyed thumbs-up when she tried it.', 4: '1'}
{2: "So you're opening a food stall?", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yep. This spot seems perfect.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lifts her arm, and with a sharp whoosh, four powered arms burst from the backpack on her back.'}
{3: 'They waste no time. In seconds, the powered arms sort through the cart, clear the clutter, and neatly set up a cooking station.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'And... No way I can handle all these festival guests by myself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'One of the arms tosses a can of cherry blossom soda. Yata catches it midair.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'So how about this... think of it as paid help? Once we close, I\'ll give you a "Yata 24-Hour Support Voucher." Whether it\'s training or chores, I\'m on call.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pshhh—she cracks open the can and offers it to you.'}
{2: '(Take the soda)', 3: '54', 4: 'One voucher might not cut it.', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...You're so greedy.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata sighs.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Fine. I'll toss in a few extra limited to the next 48 hours. Better use them quick before they expire.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You accept the can and take a sip of the crisp, refreshing soda. Consider the deal sealed.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Yata's Kitchen—now open for business!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Customer', 3: 'Hi, one takoyaki, please.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata, one takoyaki order.', 3: '68'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Got it. One takoyaki, coming right up!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata flips the griddle with a practiced motion. Several golden takoyaki balls fly into the air. Mechanical arms catch them midair and drop them neatly onto a plate.'}
{3: 'Then, the arms pass the plate down the line, relay-style, until it reaches your serving station.'}
{2: "Here's your takoyaki. Enjoy.", 3: '79'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Customer', 3: 'Mmm, this is amazing.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Customer', 3: 'This smells incredible... Hydrangea Island specialty? Count me in.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'Human... culinary culture... purchase... learning...', 4: '3'}
{2: "Welcome to Yata's Kitchen. Please line up in an orderly fashion...", 3: '89'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1077.jpg'}
{3: 'As the sun sinks lower, the ingredient boxes begin to empty.'}
{3: "You and Yata stay completely absorbed in the rush. Time slips by. It's only after the final customer leaves that you realize night has fallen over Constellia."}
{2: "We're finally done.", 3: '98', 4: "Didn't expect it to be this busy.", 5: '98'}
{3: 'You flip the cart\'s sign to "Closed" and grab two cans of cherry soda from the cooler. But Yata\'s still at the stove, her back to you, working on something.'}
{2: 'Yata?', 3: '101', 4: "Come on, we're closed now.", 5: '101'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "J-just hang on! I'm almost done!", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Press the cold soda can against her neck)', 3: '104', 4: 'What are you being so sneaky about?', 5: '118'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: '【kuroname】! Sneak attack, huh?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'She grabs a ketchup bottle, spins around, and retaliates, drawing a sweet red stripe across your cheek.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Whew, all done. Take a look.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'She lifts a plate. On it sits a perfectly made omurice.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '-2', 10: '1'}

{1: 'The golden egg sheet wraps around steaming rice, and the ketchup glows under the evening light.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Lines of ketchup spell out a message in quick strokes, barely legible—', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab'}
{2: '"Happy Double Seventh Festival."', 3: '127'}
{1: '1', 3: "The breeze stirs Yata's silver hair. A rare blush colors her face as she turns her head, avoiding your eyes."}
{3: "She takes a breath, like she's trying to regain composure, and finally breaks the silence."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: '【kuroname】, you know what day it is. And you agreed to spend it with me, so...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What kind of day?', 3: '135'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "—Ahem! Don't play dumb!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She clears her throat, but a blush quickly creeps up to her ears, impossible to hide.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Anyway! Thanks for your help today!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I spent a long, long time learning how to make this omurice. Think of it as a reward.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "It's the first time I've cooked this for someone else. Try it.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Open your mouth)', 3: '143', 4: '(Pick up the spoon and take a bite)', 5: '147'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...I'm not good at handling childish types.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "But I'll make an exception for you. I'll even train myself to get better at it.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'The moment you taste it, the flavor hits deep. Rich, warm, comforting. A strange sense of fulfillment washes over you.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Seeing you quietly savor it, Yata stares with wide eyes, full of anticipation.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Don't just eat in silence! How is it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Delicious. I love it.', 3: '158', 4: "You're a culinary genius.", 5: '158'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Really? Give me the spoon, I want a taste too.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Feed her)', 3: '160', 4: '(Hand her the spoon)', 5: '160'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Mmm, this is actually good. Way better than what Discord makes. Lucky you, getting a taste of my cooking.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She brags about her cooking skills while eagerly digging in, clearly enjoying every bite.'}
{2: 'Not so fast. Did you forget our tradition?', 3: '166'}
{3: 'You open two cans of cherry blossom soda and hand one to her, a ritual just for the two of you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Almost forgot. Here you go, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Here's to you, to us—Happy Double Seventh Festival.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah. Happy Double Seventh Festival.', 3: '175'}
{2: 'Yata & 【kuroname】', 3: '—Cheers!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{3: 'After the meal, Yata keeps her promise and writes out several "24-Hour Support Vouchers" for you.'}
{3: 'Before handing them over, she mischievously adds a note to each one: "Valid only within 48 hours."'}
{1: 'Those little details—the teasing, the laughter—are moments meant just for you and Yata. Small, joyful things only the two of you share.', 3: '50', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'Those little details—the teasing, the laughter—are moments meant just for you and Yata. Small, joyful things only the two of you share.'}
